full_summary:
**Senior ATIP Policy and Advisory Services** 

**Reference Number:** cb-329-28687747  
**Amendment Number:** 6  
**Solicitation Number:** ECFT-RFP-2022-1797  
**Publication Date:** November 29, 2023  
**Tender Closing Date:** January 9, 2024, 2:00 pm  
**Expected Contract Start Date:** April 1, 2024  
**Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2025  

**Background and Requirement:**
The Office of the Chief Electoral Officer of Canada (Elections Canada) requires the services of a Senior Advisor for Access to Information and Privacy (ATIP) policy and governance support.

**Incumbent:** At present, the work is not being performed by a contractor.

**Security Clearances:** The contractor will require a minimum corporate security clearance of FSC-Secret and a minimum resource security clearance of Secret.

**Contract Period:** The initial term of the contract will be from the effective date to March 31, 2025. The contractor may be awarded options to extend the contract by three one-year periods.

**Submission of Proposals:**
Proposals shall be submitted electronically using the Connect service provided by Canada Post Corporation or delivered, sealed, to the Proposal Receiving Unit on or before the closing date.

**Selection Methodology:**
The selection methodology is a competitive procurement strategy with the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Contact Information:**
Stefania Menasce  
Email: [proposal@elections.ca](mailto:proposal@elections.ca)  
Phone: 873-416-1578  
Address: 30 Victoria Street, Gatineau, QC J8X 0A8

**Trade Agreements:**
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:  
Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement  
Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement  
Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)  
Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement  
Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)  
Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)  
Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity:**
This tender announcement is invited from bidders across Canada and worldwide.
